name: Firefox: Combined favicon and close button
description: Merges the tab close button into the favicon/throbber.
additional_info:
This style sheet merges the tab close button in Firefox into the tab favicon/throbber, so that the close button is only visible when hovering over the tab. This saves space and reduces visual clutter.

The close buttons are merged into the favicons rather than the other way around because i use OS X, and the decorator buttons in OS X belong on the left. If you use Windows, you could probably swap the order, though favicons on the right seems kind of weird.

This should work for any Firefox theme, you don't need the dev one shown in the screen-shot.
